titles.title: To authorize expansion of Fort Davis National Historic Site in Fort Davis, Texas, by 16 acres.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 105-669.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 377.

action.text: Mr. Jones moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 11/13/1997--Introduced. Increases the number of acres the Secretary of the Interior is authorized to acquire for the Fort Davis National Historic Site in Fort Davis, Texas, by 16.
